mapper.sql: id, per_id perId, user_id userId, rapport_date rapportDate,goal,period
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rapport ( id,per_id, user_id, rapport_date, content, goal,period) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rapportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{goal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{period,jdbcType=FLOAT})
mapper.update: UPDATE rapport SET per_id = #{perId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rapport_date = #{rapportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, goal = #{goal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, period = #{period,jdbcType=FLOAT} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `user` u,personal_information p,rapport r WHERE r.user_id=u.id AND r.per_id=p.id

SELECT r.id,u.username, p.name, r.goal,r.content,r.rapport_date rapportDate,r.period from rapport r INNER JOIN personal_information p ON r.per_id =p.id INNER JOIN `user` u ON r.user_id=u.id limit #{skipNum},#{takeNum}
